Author: GitHub
Title: What's new in Reanimated 4 for React Native?
Description:
Reanimated 4 is officially stable! Bring the power and simplicity of declarative, CSS-style animations and transitions to your React Native projects. In this quick look, we cover the new API, the more natural spring animation, and what you need to know before upgrading.

#ReactNative #Reanimated #Animation
